SELECT * FROM (
SELECT br.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, br.nid AS tenderOrdid, '' AS assignOrdid, br.repay_ordid AS repayOrdid, hic.inst_name AS instName, b.plan_nid AS planNid, b.borrow_user_name AS borrowUserName, t.user_name AS recoverUserName, '1' AS period, 1 AS recoverPeriod, t.account,
IF ( br.recover_status = 1, 0, br.recover_capital - br.credit_amount ) AS amountHold, br.recover_capital - br.credit_amount AS recoverCapital, br.recover_interest - br.credit_interest_amount AS recoverInterest, br.recover_account - br.credit_amount - br.credit_interest_amount AS recoverAccount, br.recover_fee - ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cr1.manage_fee), 0) FROM ht_credit_repay cr1 WHERE cr1.credit_tender_nid = br.nid AND cr1.recover_period = br.recover_period ) - ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cr1.manage_fee), 0) FROM ht_hjh_debt_credit_repay cr1 WHERE cr1.invest_order_id = br.nid AND cr1.repay_period = br.recover_period ) AS recoverFee,
IF ( b.`status` != 8, br.recover_status, 8 ) AS recoverStatus,
IF ( bry.repay_status = 1 AND bry.repay_action_time > 0, CASE bry.repay_money_source WHEN 1 THEN '借款人还款' WHEN 2 THEN '机构垫付' WHEN 3 THEN '保证金垫付' ELSE '借款人还款' END, '' ) AS repayMoneySource, IFNULL((SELECT l.amount FROM ht_account_list l WHERE l.nid = br.repay_ordid LIMIT 1),0) AS recoverAmountTotal, FROM_UNIXTIME(br.recover_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS recoverTime,
IF ( br.recover_yestime IS NULL OR br.recover_yestime = '', '', FROM_UNIXTIME( br.recover_yestime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ) AS repayActionTime, b.borrow_style AS borrowStyle, b.borrow_period AS borrowPeriod, b.manage_fee_rate AS feeRate, b.differential_rate AS differentialRate, b.verify_time AS verifyTime, b.account AS borrowAccount, '1' AS recordType FROM ht_borrow_recover br INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON br.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON binfo.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS t ON br.tender_id = t.id INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay AS bry ON b.borrow_nid = bry.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code WHERE ( b.borrow_style = 'end' OR b.borrow_style = 'endday' )
UNION ALL
SELECT rp.borrow_nid, rp.nid AS tenderOrdid, '' AS assignOrdid, rp.repay_order_id AS repayOrdid, hic.inst_name AS instName, b.plan_nid AS planNid, b.borrow_user_name AS borrowUserName, t.user_name AS recoverUserName, concat_ws( '/', rp.recover_period, b.borrow_period ) AS period, rp.recover_period AS recoverPeriod, t.account,
br.recover_capital - br.credit_amount - (( SELECT IFNULL( SUM(p.recover_capital_yes), 0 ) FROM ht_borrow_recover_plan p WHERE br.nid = p.nid AND p.recover_status = 1 ) - (select IFNULL(SUM(t.repay_capital_yes),0) from ht_hjh_debt_credit_tender t where t.invest_order_id = br.nid) - (select IFNULL(SUM(t.assign_repay_capital),0) from ht_credit_tender t where t.credit_tender_nid = br.nid) )AS amountHold, rp.recover_capital - rp.credit_amount AS recoverCapital, rp.recover_interest - rp.credit_interest_amount AS recoverInterest, rp.recover_account - rp.credit_amount - rp.credit_interest_amount AS recoverAccount, rp.recover_fee - ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cr1.manage_fee), 0) FROM ht_credit_repay cr1 WHERE cr1.credit_tender_nid = rp.nid AND cr1.recover_period = rp.recover_period ) - ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cr1.manage_fee), 0) FROM ht_hjh_debt_credit_repay cr1 WHERE cr1.invest_order_id = rp.nid AND cr1.repay_period = rp.recover_period )AS recoverFee,
IF ( rp.recover_status = 0,
IF (brp.advance_status = 3, 8, 0), 1 ) AS recoverStatus,
IF ( brp.repay_status = 1 AND brp.repay_action_time > 0, CASE brp.repay_money_source WHEN 1 THEN '借款人还款' WHEN 2 THEN '机构垫付' WHEN 3 THEN '保证金垫付' ELSE '借款人还款' END, '' ) AS repayMoneySource, IFNULL((SELECT l.amount FROM ht_account_list l WHERE l.nid = rp.repay_order_id LIMIT 1),0) AS recoverAmountTotal, FROM_UNIXTIME(rp.recover_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS recoverTime,
IF ( rp.recover_yestime IS NULL OR rp.recover_yestime = '', '', FROM_UNIXTIME( rp.recover_yestime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ) AS repayActionTime, b.borrow_style AS borrowStyle, b.borrow_period AS borrowPeriod, b.manage_fee_rate AS feeRate, b.differential_rate AS differentialRate, b.verify_time AS verifyTime, b.account AS borrowAccount, '2' AS recordType FROM ht_borrow_recover_plan rp INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover br ON br.nid = rp.nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON rp.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON binfo.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS t ON rp.tender_id = t.id INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay_plan AS brp ON b.borrow_nid = brp.borrow_nid AND brp.repay_period = rp.recover_period LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT b.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, cr.credit_tender_nid AS tenderOrdid, cr.assign_nid AS assignOrdid, cr.credit_repay_order_id AS repayOrdid, hic.inst_name AS instName, b.plan_nid AS planNid, b.borrow_user_name AS borrowUserName, cr.user_name AS recoverUserName, IF ( b.borrow_style = 'end' OR b.borrow_style = 'endday', 1, concat_ws( '/', cr.recover_period, b.borrow_period ) ) AS period, cr.recover_period AS recoverPeriod, ct.assign_capital AS account, ct.assign_capital - ct.assign_repay_capital AS amountHold, cr.assign_capital AS recoverCapital, cr.assign_interest AS recoverInterest, cr.assign_account AS recoverAccount, cr.manage_fee AS recoverFee, IF ( cr.`status` = 0,
IF (cr.advance_status = 3, 8, 0), 1 ) AS recoverStatus,
IF ( cr.`status` = 1 AND cr.assign_repay_yes_time > 0, CASE bry.repay_money_source WHEN 1 THEN '借款人还款' WHEN 2 THEN '机构垫付' WHEN 3 THEN '保证金垫付' ELSE '借款人还款' END, '' ) AS repayMoneySource, cr.assign_repay_account + IF ( cr. STATUS = 1, cr.manage_fee, 0 ) AS recoverAmountTotal, FROM_UNIXTIME( cr.assign_repay_next_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS recoverTime,
IF ( cr.assign_repay_yes_time IS NULL OR cr.assign_repay_yes_time = '', '', FROM_UNIXTIME( cr.assign_repay_yes_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ) AS repayActionTime, b.borrow_style AS borrowStyle, b.borrow_period AS borrowPeriod, b.manage_fee_rate AS feeRate, b.differential_rate AS differentialRate, b.verify_time AS verifyTime, b.account AS borrowAccount, '3' AS recordType FROM ht_credit_repay cr INNER JOIN ht_credit_tender ct ON ct.assign_nid = cr.assign_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON cr.bid_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON binfo.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS t ON cr.credit_tender_nid = t.nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay AS bry ON b.borrow_nid = bry.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_repay_plan AS brp ON b.borrow_nid = brp.borrow_nid AND brp.repay_period = cr.assign_repay_period LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT b.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, hcr.invest_order_id AS tenderOrdid, hcr.assign_order_id AS assignOrdid, hcr.credit_repay_order_id AS repayOrdid, hic.inst_name AS instName, b.plan_nid AS planNid, b.borrow_user_name AS borrowUserName, hcr.user_name AS recoverUserName, IF ( b.borrow_style = 'end' OR b.borrow_style = 'endday', 1, concat_ws( '/', hcr.repay_period, b.borrow_period ) ) AS period, hcr.repay_period AS recoverPeriod, hct.assign_capital AS account, hct.assign_capital - hct.repay_capital_yes AS amountHold, hcr.repay_capital AS recoverCapital, hcr.repay_interest AS recoverInterest, hcr.repay_account AS recoverAccount, hcr.manage_fee AS recoverFee, IF ( hcr.repay_status = 0,
IF (hcr.advance_status = 3, 8, 0), 1 ) AS recoverStatus,
IF ( hcr.repay_status = 1 AND hcr.assign_repay_yes_time > 0, CASE bry.repay_money_source WHEN 1 THEN '借款人还款' WHEN 2 THEN '机构垫付' WHEN 3 THEN '保证金垫付' ELSE '借款人还款' END, '' ) AS repayMoneySource, hcr.receive_account_yes + IF ( hcr.repay_status = 1, hcr.manage_fee, 0 ) AS recoverAmountTotal, IF ( hcr.assign_repay_next_time IS NULL OR hcr.assign_repay_time = '', '', FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.assign_repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) AS recoverTime,
IF ( hcr.assign_repay_yes_time IS NULL OR hcr.assign_repay_yes_time = '', '', FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.assign_repay_yes_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) ) AS repayActionTime, b.borrow_style AS borrowStyle, b.borrow_period AS borrowPeriod, b.manage_fee_rate AS feeRate, b.differential_rate AS differentialRate, b.verify_time AS verifyTime, b.account AS borrowAccount, '4' AS recordType FROM ht_hjh_debt_credit_repay hcr INNER JOIN ht_hjh_debt_credit_tender hct ON hct.assign_order_id = hcr.assign_order_id INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON hcr.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON binfo.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS t ON hcr.invest_order_id = t.nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay AS bry ON b.borrow_nid = bry.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_repay_plan AS brp ON b.borrow_nid = brp.borrow_nid AND brp.repay_period = hcr.assign_repay_period LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code WHERE 1=1
) t ORDER BY t.borrowNid,t.recoverUserName,t.recoverPeriod ASC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT COUNT(t.borrowNid) FROM ( SELECT br.borrow_nid AS borrowNid FROM ht_borrow_recover br INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON br.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON binfo.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS t ON br.tender_id = t.id INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay AS bry ON b.borrow_nid = bry.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code WHERE ( b.borrow_style = 'end' OR b.borrow_style = 'endday' )
UNION ALL SELECT rp.borrow_nid FROM ht_borrow_recover_plan rp INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover br ON br.nid = rp.nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON rp.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON binfo.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS t ON rp.tender_id = t.id INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay_plan AS brp ON b.borrow_nid = brp.borrow_nid AND brp.repay_period = rp.recover_period LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL SELECT b.borrow_nid AS borrowNid FROM ht_credit_repay cr INNER JOIN ht_credit_tender ct ON ct.assign_nid = cr.assign_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON cr.bid_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON binfo.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS t ON cr.credit_tender_nid = t.nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay AS bry ON b.borrow_nid = bry.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_repay_plan AS brp ON b.borrow_nid = brp.borrow_nid AND brp.repay_period = cr.assign_repay_period LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL SELECT b.borrow_nid AS borrowNid FROM ht_hjh_debt_credit_repay hcr INNER JOIN ht_hjh_debt_credit_tender hct ON hct.assign_order_id = hcr.assign_order_id INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON hcr.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON binfo.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS t ON hcr.invest_order_id = t.nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay AS bry ON b.borrow_nid = bry.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_repay_plan AS brp ON b.borrow_nid = brp.borrow_nid AND brp.repay_period = hcr.assign_repay_period LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code WHERE 1=1
) t

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(recoverCapital,0)) AS capitalSum, SUM(IFNULL(recoverInterest,0)) AS interestSum, SUM(IFNULL(recoverAccount,0)) AS accountSum, SUM(IFNULL(recoverFee,0)) AS feeSum FROM (
SELECT br.recover_capital - br.credit_amount AS recoverCapital, br.recover_interest - br.credit_interest_amount AS recoverInterest, br.recover_account - br.credit_amount - br.credit_interest_amount AS recoverAccount, br.recover_fee - ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cr1.manage_fee), 0) FROM ht_credit_repay cr1 WHERE cr1.credit_tender_nid = br.nid AND cr1.recover_period = br.recover_period ) - ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cr1.manage_fee), 0) FROM ht_hjh_debt_credit_repay cr1 WHERE cr1.invest_order_id = br.nid AND cr1.repay_period = br.recover_period ) AS recoverFee FROM ht_borrow_recover br INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON br.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON binfo.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS t ON br.tender_id = t.id INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay AS bry ON b.borrow_nid = bry.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code WHERE ( b.borrow_style = 'end' OR b.borrow_style = 'endday' )
UNION ALL
SELECT rp.recover_capital - rp.credit_amount AS recoverCapital, rp.recover_interest - rp.credit_interest_amount AS recoverInterest, rp.recover_account - rp.credit_amount - rp.credit_interest_amount AS recoverAccount, rp.recover_fee - ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cr1.manage_fee), 0) FROM ht_credit_repay cr1 WHERE cr1.credit_tender_nid = rp.nid AND cr1.recover_period = rp.recover_period ) - ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cr1.manage_fee), 0) FROM ht_hjh_debt_credit_repay cr1 WHERE cr1.invest_order_id = rp.nid AND cr1.repay_period = rp.recover_period )AS recoverFee FROM ht_borrow_recover_plan rp INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover br ON br.nid = rp.nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON rp.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON binfo.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS t ON rp.tender_id = t.id INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay_plan AS brp ON b.borrow_nid = brp.borrow_nid AND brp.repay_period = rp.recover_period LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT cr.assign_capital AS recoverCapital, cr.assign_interest AS recoverInterest, cr.assign_account AS recoverAccount, cr.manage_fee AS recoverFee FROM ht_credit_repay cr JOIN ht_borrow b ON cr.bid_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON binfo.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS t ON cr.credit_tender_nid = t.nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay AS bry ON b.borrow_nid = bry.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT hcr.repay_capital AS recoverCapital, hcr.repay_interest AS recoverInterest, hcr.repay_account AS recoverAccount, hcr.manage_fee AS recoverFee FROM ht_hjh_debt_credit_repay hcr INNER JOIN ht_hjh_debt_credit_tender hct ON hct.assign_order_id = hcr.assign_order_id INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON hcr.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON binfo.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender AS t ON hcr.invest_order_id = t.nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_repay AS bry ON b.borrow_nid = bry.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_repay_plan AS brp ON b.borrow_nid = brp.borrow_nid AND brp.repay_period = hcr.assign_repay_period LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code WHERE 1=1
) t

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT br.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, br.nid AS tenderOrdid, '' AS assignOrdid, br.repay_ordid AS repayOrdid, hic.inst_name AS instName, b.plan_nid AS planNid, b.user_id AS borrowUserId, b.borrow_user_name AS borrowUserName, binfo. NAME AS borrowName, bpt.borrow_name AS projectTypeName, IF(b.borrow_style = 'endday',CONCAT(b.borrow_period,'天'),CONCAT(b.borrow_period,'个月')) AS borrowPeriod, CONCAT(b.borrow_apr, '%') AS borrowApr, b.account AS borrowAccount, b.borrow_account_yes AS borrowAccountYes, bs. NAME AS repayType, u2.user_id AS recoverUserId, u2.username AS recoverUserName, CASE u2.attribute WHEN 0 THEN '无主单' WHEN 1 THEN '有主单' WHEN 2 THEN '线下员工' WHEN 3 THEN '线上员工' ELSE '' END recoverUserAttribute, CASE WHEN u2.attribute = '1' THEN `od6`.`name` ELSE `od3`.`name` END `recoverRegionName`, CASE WHEN u2.attribute = '1' THEN `od5`.`name` ELSE `od2`.`name` END `recoverBranchName`, CASE WHEN u2.attribute = '1' THEN `od4`.`name` ELSE `od`.`name` END `recoverDepartmentName`, u3.username AS referrerName, u3.user_id AS referrerUserId, u3.truename AS referrerTrueName, `od6`.`name` AS `referrerRegionName`, `od5`.`name` AS `referrerBranchName`, `od4`.`name` AS `referrerDepartmentName`, t.account AS recoverTotal, IF ( br.recover_status = 1, 0, br.recover_capital - br.credit_amount ) AS amountHold, br.recover_capital - br.credit_amount AS recoverCapital, br.recover_interest - br.credit_interest_amount AS recoverInterest, br.recover_account - br.credit_amount - br.credit_interest_amount AS recoverAccount, br.recover_fee AS recoverFee,
IF ( b.repay_last_time = '' OR b.repay_last_time = '0' OR b.repay_last_time = 'null', '', FROM_UNIXTIME( b.repay_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) AS recoverLastTime, '1' AS period, '1' AS periodTotal, br.recover_capital - br.credit_amount AS recoverCapitalPeriod, br.recover_interest - br.credit_interest_amount AS recoverInterestPeriod, br.recover_account - br.credit_amount - br.credit_interest_amount AS recoverAccountPeriod, br.recover_fee AS recoverFeePeriod, br.charge_days AS chargeDays, br.charge_interest - br.charge_penalty_interest AS chargeInterestReduce, br.charge_penalty_interest AS chargePenaltyInterest, br.late_days AS lateDays, br.late_interest AS lateInterest, br.recover_capital_yes AS recoverCapitalYesPeriod, br.recover_interest_yes AS recoverInterestYesPeriod, br.recover_Account_yes AS recoverAccountYesPeriod, br.recover_fee_yes AS recoverFeeYesPeriod, br.recover_capital_wait AS recoverCapitalWait, br.recover_interest_wait AS recoverInterestWait, br.recover_account_wait AS recoverAccountWait, bry.repay_username AS repayUserName, IF ( b.`status` != 8, br.recover_status, 8 ) AS recoverStatus, IF(bry.auto_repay=0,'主动还款','系统自动') AS autoRepay,
IF ( bry.repay_status = 1 AND bry.repay_action_time > 0, CASE bry.repay_money_source WHEN 1 THEN '借款人还款' WHEN 2 THEN '机构垫付' WHEN 3 THEN '保证金垫付' ELSE '借款人还款' END, '' ) AS repayMoneySource, api.submitter, FROM_UNIXTIME(br.recover_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS recoverTime,
